Catagory.Title: Student Projects
Catagory.Explanation: As part of the graduation requirements for a major in computer science, all students must complete either a group or individual project. In this project course, students must demonstrate what they have learned at MacEwan. Students can come up with their own ideas for their projects or get ideas from faculty members. In the past, students have developed various applications for their final projects, including web and desktop applications, image processing, video games, and embedded systems.
